Particle_Burst.display_help: Android Menders are capable of firing a blast from their shoulder mounted particle weapon. Enemies struck by this attack will suffer energy damage and additional energy damage over time.
Particle_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Minor DoT(Energy)
Particle_Burst.display_target_help: You are suffering damage over time from the Particle Blast.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
